function.name: video_transcribe
function.description: Extract audio from video and transcribe using Whisper API. Supports time-based segmentation for large videos. Returns transcript as JSON with timestamps.

operation.description: Operation to perform: transcribe (extract audio + Whisper API) or get_info (video metadata)

path.description: Path to video file (relative to project root, must be under docs/video/)

time_start.description: Start time in seconds (default: 0). Use for segmenting large videos.

time_end.description: End time in seconds (default: video duration). Use for segmenting large videos.

chunk_duration.description: Internal chunk size in seconds for Whisper API calls (default: 60s)
